name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior SREngineer with 8 years of experience, I bring strong expertise in **DevOps**, **GitOps**, and **Observability** practices, ensuring high-performance solutions across diverse sectors. My technical proficiency includes programming in **Python**, with additional familiarity in **Java**, **C**, **C++**, **Go**, **Perl**, and **Ruby**, enhancing my adaptability to various technology stacks. I have successfully deployed and managed applications using **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **ArgoCD**, while employing monitoring tools like **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and the **ELK Stack** for effective system observability.

In previous roles, I’ve focused on automation and distributed systems, leading to robust operational efficiencies. I am well-versed in CI/CD automation utilizing tools such as **GitHub Actions** and **Packer**. My experience includes deep cloud environments in **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring adherence to compliance standards while managing scalable applications. I excel in remote work settings and prioritize communication to align cross-functional teams towards common goals.
